workstations.name: Dell Optiplex

description.d: The OptiPlex 3050 Micro Desktop is an ultra-compact business desktop with multiple mounting possibilities to best fit your workspace. Offers essential best-in-class security and manageability. Enhance your productivity with powerful workstations built for long hours of continuous use. Look for features like… Increased processing power and expanded connectivity options
points: Sturdy chassis with ample room for additional memory, storage and expansion cards
Ease of upgrading and service for years of use as your organization grows

features.title: Microsoft Windows 10 Professional operating system preinstalled
features.desc: It’s your PC simplified, with fewer steps between you and what you do, easy sharing of photos and videos, and multiple ways to personalize your experience.

features.title: 4GB system memory for basic multitasking
features.desc: Adequate high-bandwidth RAM to smoothly run multiple applications and browser tabs all at once.

features.title: 500GB hard drive for serviceable file storage space
features.desc: Holds your growing collection of digital photos, music and videos. 7200 rpm spindle speed enables rapid read/write times for handling large files and complex applications.

features.title: 4 SuperSpeed 10Gbs USB 3.1 ports
features.desc: Ultra-fast data connections to transfer large files rapidly.

features.title: 2 USB 2.0 ports
features.desc: Quick plug-and-play connectivity for your devices and accessories.

features.title: Wired network connectivity
features.desc: Built-in Gigabit Ethernet LAN port plugs into wired networks.

features.title: Additional ports
features.desc: Microphone and headphone jacks. HDMI output.

workstations.note: Note: This computer does not include a built-in DVD/CD drive.

description.d: The OptiPlex 3050 Micro Desktop is an ultra-compact business desktop with multiple mounting possibilities to best fit your workspace. Offers essential best-in-class security an manageability. Featuring pin-point accuracy and palm-rejection technology, the Lenovo Active Pen (sold separately) emulates the easy comfort of a pen-on-paper writing experience. And thanks to Windows Ink, you’ll discover all the ways you can turn thoughts into action: Draw on a map and instantly receive turn-by-turn driving directions, write notes that sync up across your devices, and more. Speed & power to get things done The Yoga 720 (12”) makes multi-tasking a breeze. Featuring top-of-the-line Intel Core i7 processing and ample SATA SSD storage, this 2-in-1 packs a punch.
points: Up to 7th Gen Intel Core i7 processing
Up to 512 GB M.2 SATA SSD

description.d: The OptiPlex 3050 Micro Desktop is an ultra-compact business desktop with multiple mounting possibilities to best fit your workspace. Offers essential best-in-class security an manageability. Featuring pin-point accuracy and palm-rejection technology, the Lenovo Active Pen (sold separately) emulates the easy comfort of a pen-on-paper writing experience. And thanks to Windows Ink, you’ll discover all the ways you can turn thoughts into action: Draw on a map and instantly receive turn-by-turn driving directions, write notes that sync up across your devices, and more. Speed & power to get things done The Yoga 720 (12”) makes multi-tasking a breeze. Featuring top-of-the-line Intel Core i7 processing and ample SATA SSD storage, this 2-in-1 packs a punch.
points: Up to 7th Gen Intel Core i7 processing
Up to 512 GB M.2 SATA SSD

monitors.name: ASUS Monitor 24″
monitors.description: This monitor features a 50,000,000:1 smart contrast ratio with aspect control to deliver clear, true-to-life images and video. The Splendid Video Intelligence technology allows you to choose from among 6 preset video modes for optimal viewing.

features.title: Ultrafast 2 ms response time
features.desc: Allows pixels to change colors quickly to avoid streaking, blurring and ghosting in fast-moving scenes and video games.

features.title: 23.6″ widescreen LED panel
features.desc: Features a mercury-free design for safety.

features.title: 50,000,000:1 smart contrast ratio and 300 cd/m² brightness
features.desc: With aspect control to deliver clear, lifelike images.

features.title: 1920 x 1080 true resolution
features.desc: With 170° horizontal and 160° vertical viewing angles offers a clear, high-resolution picture from a variety of vantage points.

features.title: Splendid Video Intelligence technology
features.desc: Offers 6 preset video modes (scenery, theater, game, night view, sRGB and standard) selected via a hot key to optimize video performance and image fidelity.

features.title: Hot key controls
features.desc: Allow you to adjust the brightness and volume with an auto adjust option in addition to the video presets.

features.title: VESA standard 100mm x 100mm
features.desc: Allows for wall mounting with optional mounting kit (not included).

signature_pads.name: Topaz T-L460 SigLite LCD 1×5 Series
signature_pads.description: SigLite LCD 1×5 (T-L460-HSB-R) is Topaz’s low-cost, pressure-sensitive electronic signature capture pad with an LCD display and USB connection.

signature_pads.name: Topaz T-L460 SigLite 1×5 Series
signature_pads.description: With this model series, the signature is only viewable on the computer screen. If your application requires customers to view the signature on the pad’s screen, see the SigLite LCD 1×5.

scanners.name: Motorola-DS8108
scanners.description: We provide support for these certified handheld scanners, you are able to capture the taxpayer’s source documents and information to associate them with the appropriate tax return ATS tax Software. Get the power of a bar code scanner, digital camera and document scanner in a single, cost-effective device.
